description.name: wbtcarbitrum
description.tagline: Wrapped BTC arbitrum Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto arbitrum-wbtc Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept Wrapped BTC arbitrum directly on your website
Unique arbitrum/wbtc receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your arbitrum/wbtc wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
